A0: A barangay councilman and his live-in partner
RelatedSentence: CEBU , Philippines - A barangay councilman and his live - in partner were killed when the motorcycle they were riding crashed into the shoreline at Dumangas , Iloilo .
A resident of the area , 26 - year - old Aaron Demarana , saw the bodies of the two victims floating at the 5 - foot deep seawaters at Barangay Dacutan .
